item.content: The patient Mr John Wright was found to have first degree burns and Dr Seven and his staff treated Mr Wright by cleaning the burn and dressing the burn and observed for couple of hours before discharging Mr Wright
Medications: In case of fever, take Tylenol as advised in plan of treatment.
Appointments: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week. Follow up with Outpatient facility.

content.content: Give 1 milliGRAM(s) Oral at bedtime PRN for High Fever
Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week for Follow up with Outpatient facility
Plan Of Treatment Entries excluded/not available

td.content: Burn of first degree of wrist and hand
